account_created_and_signed_in: Account created and signed in successfully!

checkout_note: By proceeding with checkout, you agree that shopping information (including personal data) in this order will be collected by third-party sellers, direct shipping providers, and/or logistics service providers as per the privacy policy for order fulfillment, transaction completion, and inventory management.
checkout_placeOrder_exception: An error occurred. Please contact customer service for assistance.
checkoutSuccess_desc: We have received your order. Please wait for our confirmation email. Thank you for your purchase.
choose_recipients_descr: Choose who should receive this notification
contact_form_description: Please fill out the form below:
contact_form_error: Failed to send. Please try again later.
contact_form_social: You can use the following social media to contact us:
contact_form_success: We have received your message. Thank you for contacting us.
create_api_key_description: Enter a unique name for your API key to differentiate it from other keys.
create_api_key_success: Please copy your API key and store it in a safe place. For security reasons we cannot show it again.
create_Reservation_description: Fill out the form below to make a reservation
credit_bonus_rule_bonus_amount_given_whe: Bonus amount given when threshold is met

credit_bonus_rule_minimum_top_up_amount_: Minimum top-up amount to trigger bonus
credit_refill_description: Top up your credit balance to use for future purchases
credit_refill_description_ledger: Credit refill: {{creditAmount}} points. Cash value: {{dollarAmount}} {{currency}}. Amount: {{amount}} points. Bonus: {{bonus}} points. Total credit: {{totalCredit}} points.
customer_credit_cash_amount_required_whe: Cash amount is required when customer paid in person
customer_credit_paid_in_person_descripti: Check if customer paid cash in person. Leave unchecked for promotional credit.
customer_credit_system_not_enabled: Customer credit system is not enabled for this store.
default_channel_preferences_descr: Select which channels are enabled by default for new customers
default_frequency_descr: Set the default notification frequency for new customers
default_notification_type_preferences_de: Select which notification types are enabled by default for new customers
delete_account_description: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data and cannot be recovered.
delete_account_instructions: Please confirm the deletion of your account. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
delete_account_success: Your account has been permanently deleted.
delete_account_verify: Please check your email to verify the deletion of your account.

delete_Confirm: Are you sure you want to delete?
email_description: Enter the email address you want to use to log in.
email_instructions: Please enter a valid email address.
email_is_the_same: Email cannot be the same as the previous one.

facility_mgmt_bulk_add_descr: Enter quantity of facilities to add.
facility_mgmt_prefix_descr: If A is entered, the facility name will be A1,A2...
facility_pricing_rules_descr: Create different pricing for a specific time period.
failed_to_mark_all_read: Failed to mark all as read
forgot_password_email: Check your inbox for the password reset link.
frequency_description: Choose how often you want to receive notifications
hours_until_reservation: There are {{hours}} hours until the reservation time.
import_customer_descr: Upload a CSV file to import customers. CSV columns: name (required), email (optional, auto-generated if not provided), phoneNumber (optional, must be unique if provided), creditPoint (defaults to 0, creates ledger entry if value provided), creditFiat (defaults to 0, creates ledger entry if value provided). All imported customers will have 'customer' role. Users are matched by email or phoneNumber if provided. If found, user is updated; if not found, new user is created with auto-generated email.
in_person_credit_refill_note_ledger: Cash payment: {{cashAmount}} {{currency}}. Credit given: {{amount}} + bonus {{bonus}} = {{totalCredit}} points. Operator: {{operator}}.
in_person_credit_refill_note_with_extra: Cash payment: {{cashAmount}} {{currency}}. Credit given: {{amount}} + bonus {{bonus}} = {{totalCredit}} points. Operator: {{operator}}. {{note}}
magic_link_email: Please check your inbox for your login link!
name: Name
notification_center_description: View and manage all your notifications
notification_history_descr: View sent notifications and their delivery status
notification_preferences_description: Manage your notification preferences for all stores
notification_settings_descr: Configure notification channels and preferences for your store
notification_type_preferences_descriptio: Select which types of notifications you want to receive
Order_ready_to_ship_descr: click to change status to in-shipping
order_success_descr: Order created. Please wait for the store to confirm.
Order_unpaid_descr: Check to confirm cash payment and order details.
otp_rate_limit_exceeded: Too many requests. Please try again in {{retryAfter}} seconds.
otp_resent_successfully: OTP code resent successfully. Please check your phone.
otp_sent_successfully: OTP code sent successfully. Please check your phone.
otp_verification_failed: OTP verification failed. Please try again.
passkeys_description: Passkey is a password-less authentication method that can be used with your device such as FaceID, TouchID, fingerprint recognition, etc. to log in to the system.
passkeys_instructions: Passkey is a password-less authentication method that can be used with your device such as FaceID, TouchID, fingerprint recognition, etc. to log in to the system.
phone_format_instruction: Enter your phone number in international format (e.g., +886912345678)
Please_sign_in_to_make_reservation: Please sign in to make a reservation
pricing_rule_cost_descr: Leave empty to use the default cost in store settings.
pricing_rule_credit_descr: Leave empty to use the default credit in store settings.
pricing_rule_status_descr: Enable or disable this pricing rule.
Product_description_helper: The description will be displayed on the product page.
Product_isFeatured_descr: Display the product on the homepage
Product_status_descr: Only published products can be purchased
Product_useOption_descr: Price will be calculated based on selected options
ProductOption_isRequired_descr: Must fill this option when placing the order.
ProductOption_maxSelection_descr: Customer can select up to N options.
ProductOption_mgmt_add_descr: allow customer to customize product's options.
ProductOption_minQuantity_descr: Customer need to select at least N options.
ProductOption_minSelection_descr: Customer need to select at least N options.
ProductOption_selections_descr:
Enter the selection line by line. i.e. large:10:0
small:0:1
providers_description: Use third-party login providers to log in.
qr_code_facility_ordering_URL_descr: This is the ordering URL for this facility. Typically when customers are ready, they can scan this QR code to order through this URL.
qr_code_ordering_URL_descr: This is the ordering URL of the store. Customers can order through this URL.
qr_code_page_description: You can download and print the following QR Codes. If you want to design your own QR Code, please use the given URL.
qr_code_reservation_URL_descr: This is the reservation URL of the store. Customers can make reservations through this URL.
qr_code_waiting_list_URL_descr: This is the waiting list URL of the store. Customers can get a number through this URL.
reservation_prepaid_required: This reservation requires prepayment. Please sign in to continue.
reset_password_success: You can now sign in with your new password!
rsvp_can_not_be_cancelled: ⚠️ This reservation is within the cannot cancel window. No refund will be provided if cancelled.
rsvp_Can_Reserve_After_descr: From now, maximum hours in the future that reservations can be made. e.g. 1 year = 8760 hours; 1 month = 730 hours. Default: 3 months (2190 hours).
rsvp_Can_Reserve_Before_descr: From now, how many hours in advanced later can reservations be made. e.g. If current time is 7PM and this is set to 2, only reservations at 9PM or later are allowed.
rsvp_Can_Select_Service_Staff_descr: Customers must select a service staff to complete the reservation.
rsvp_Cancel_Hours_descr: e.g. 24 hours before the reservation time can cancel for free.
rsvp_cancel_reservation_confirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel this reservation? This action cannot be undone.
rsvp_cancellation_policy: If you cannot come at the reserved time, please cancel at least {{hours}} hours before the reservation.
rsvp_cannot_cancel_reservation: This store does not allow reservations to be cancelled.
rsvp_delete_reservation_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this reservation?
rsvp_edit_descr: Create new reservation or edit existing reservation.
rsvp_Hours_descr: Use the settings here to determine the available reservation hours (instead of using store's business hours).
rsvp_No_Need_To_Confirm: No Need To Confirm When Fully Paid
rsvp_No_Need_To_Confirm_descr: If the reservation is paid, no need to confirm the reservation.
rsvp_please_sign_in: Please sign in to make a reservation
rsvp_Prepaid_Amount: Default amount of money or points to be prepaid.
rsvp_Prepaid_Amount_descr: Customer need to prepay the amount of money or points to make a reservation.
rsvp_prepaid_payment_note: RSVP prepaid. Customer points used: {{points}}. Cash value: {{cashValue}} {{currency}}.
rsvp_Prepaid_Percentage_descr: Prepaid percentage: default is 0, meaning prepaid is not required. 100 means need to paid in full.
rsvp_prepaid_required: This reservation will deduct your prepaid points: {{points}} points.
rsvp_Prepaid_Required_descr: Customer must have a balance to reserve / booking requires a deposit.
rsvp_Require_Signature_descr: Customer must confirm and sign off. RSVP will consider in-completed if not signed off.
rsvp_Show_Cost_descr: Whether to display the amount deducted or points on the reservation page.
rsvp_Single_Service_Mode_descr: For personal shops: only ONE reservation per time slot across all facilities. When enabled, blocks any reservation if another reservation exists for the same time slot, regardless of facility. When disabled (default), multiple reservations can exist on the same time slot as long as they use different facilities.
rsvp_Use_Business_Hours_descr: Turn on to use store's business hours. Or specify the available hours here.
select_channels_descr: Select which channels to use for delivery (only enabled channels shown)
send_notification_descr: Send notifications to customers or staff
service_staff_add_descr: Add a new service staff member
service_staff_id_copied: Service staff ID copied to clipboard.
set_password_description: Click the button below to receive an email to set up a password for your account.
sign_up_description: Enter your information to create an account
signin_cannot_receive_email: If you no longer able to access the mail box, please contact customer service.
signin_description: Sign in with your email and password.
signin_or_signup: Please use the following methods to sign in or sign up.
store_closed: Store is closed, unable to accept orders
store_notification_preferences_descr: Set default notification preferences for new customers. Customers can override these preferences in their account settings.
store_reservation_descr: Please click + to make a reservation. It's {{required}} to prepay money or credits to complete the reservation. Free cancel is available at least {{hours}} hours ahead of the reservation time.
store_specific_preferences_description: Override global preferences for this store
store_template_note: This template will be store-specific (not global)
storeAdmin_switchLevel_cancel_confirm: You are changing to Free version. Are you sure?
storeAdmin_switchLevel_cancel_result: You are back to Free version. You can use paid features til: {0}.
storeAdmin_switchLevel_pageDescr: pick a version that best fits your needs.
storeAdmin_switchLevel_title: The selected subscription plan will incur charges monthly.
StoreSettings_acceptAnonymousOrder_descr: customer does not need to log in to place an order.
StoreSettings_autoAcceptOrder_descr: No need to confirm orders when the setting is on.
StoreSettings_Credit_Max_Purchase_descr: e.g. Can only purchase 100 points at most. 0 means unlimited.
StoreSettings_Credit_Min_Purchase_descr: e.g. At least purchase 10 points. 0 means unlimited.
StoreSettings_isOpen_descr: Indicates whether the store is open or closed regardless of the business hours setting.
StoreSettings_PayoutSchedule_descr: We will wire your revenue according to the settings.
StoreSettings_requirePrepay_descr: If on, non-paid orders is hidden to the staff.
storeSettings_Store_Description_descr: A concise and compelling store introduction that will be displayed prominently on the homepage, allowing customers to immediately understand your store's unique value. For example: "Crafting every cup with care, bringing you the warmest moments" or "Fresh ingredients and professional service, creating unforgettable dining experiences".
StoreSettings_Use_Customer_Credit_descr: Turn on to enable customer credit/ points system.
StoreSettings_use_order_system_descr: Enable the order system for this store.
StoreSettings_useBusinessHours_descr: If turn off, will use [Is opened] parameter.
subject: Subject
subscribe_order_success_descr: You've completed the subscription. Service is ready to use as of now.
subscribe_title: Choose the plan that works for you
subscription_billing_portal1: To update payment info, please visit:
subscription_success_descr: Subscription added. Advanced features are ready to use.
system_error_descr: unfortunately, this service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
template_description: Optional: Use a message template for consistent formatting
two_factor_card_description: Two-factor authentication is a security feature that requires two forms of identification to access your account.

two_factor_disable_instructions: Please enter your password to disable 2FA.
two_factor_enable_instructions: Please enter your password to enable 2FA.
